TPWObj Class Reference

Used internally by TPWrittenObjects. More...

#include <tobjstrm.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

TPWObj is used internally by TPWrittenObjects. The class TPWrittenObjects is a friend of TPWobj, so all its member functions can access the private members of TPWObj.
